SRS-28;"OncoFlow shall display the following basic information of the selected patient:
- Patient ID
- DOB
- Gender
- ECOG grade
- Diagnosis
- Stage
- Last Treatment (Tx)
- Allergies
- Comorbidities
- Molecular Profile
- Metastasis
- Weight
- Height
- BMI and
- BSA.";Yes;;
SRS-29;"OncoFlow shall display the following patient history info of a patient:
- Family history
- Social history
- Substance history and
- Environmental/occupation history.";No;;
SRS-30;"OncoFlow shall be able to display the Patient data points on a timeline
- Clinical evaluation
- Imaging
- Pathology
- Biomarkers
- Treatment and Plan
- Encounters
- Patient Status and Events
- Uncategorized.";No;;
SRS-31;OncoFlow patient timeline shall start from the actual patient's first data point until the current day.;No;;
SRS-33;"OncoFlow shall be able to display patients active and completed medications sorted by time with the following info:
- Route
- Medicine name
- Dosage
- Duration
- Notes
- Prescribed date.";No;;
SRS-82;OncoFlow shall populate active and completed medications in separate groups.;Yes;;
SRS-83;OncoFlow shall collapse completed medication info by default to avoid mixing up active and completed medications.;Yes;;
SRS-86;OncoFlow shall display medications with unknown time at the end of the medication list.;No;;

(For event definition see the "Definitions
SRS-35;OncoFlow shall be able to display the label of the event points.;No;;

SRS-42;OncoFlow shall be able to display DICOM image's preview on a side panel.;No;;
SRS-79;OncoFlow users shall be able to close the side panel.;No;;
SRS-67;OncoFlow users shall be able to see visual trends of the trendable parameters.;No;;

-	Google Chrome

SRS-46;OncoFlow shall be able to be deployed on a virtualized environment on the top of EHL 2.0 platform or higher.;No;;
SRS-47;"OncoFlow shall respond within 3 secs of user action to subsequent clicks of the user (after the first load) on the application.
Note : The assumption is that the network/environment related effects are in the operating range per the Service Manual.";No;;

-	Software version

SRS-59;"OncoFlow shall have "About" info
-	Product name
-	Device Identifier (Product or Catalog number)
-	Software version number
-	Copyright disclaimer
-	Trademark disclaimer
-	Open source and commercial software disclosure
-	Name and address of the legal manufacturer
-	Country of Origin
-	Warnings/Precautions (If applicable)";No;;
SRS-60;"OncoFlow shall provide online User Manual for the users.
-	Name of Device
-	Name and Address of the Legal Manufacturer
-	Country of Origin
-	Warnings / Precautions(if necessary)
-	Directions [Instructions] for Use
-	Indications for Use
-	Contraindications
-	Revision/control";Yes;;
